metadata.title: CVE-2024-57901 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:af_packet: fix vlan_get_protocol_dgram() vs MSG_PEEKBlamed commit forgot MSG_PEEK case, allowing a crash [1] as foundby syzbot.Rework vlan_get_protocol_dgram() to not touch skb at all,so that it can be used from many cpus on the same skb.Add a const qualifier to skb argument.[1]skbuff: skb_under_panic:
